answers.answer: 35+4 ...and i too am having a boy:) ...what are you naming him? And lucky you i don't have anything...waiting for baby showers which are this weekend. ...very very paranoid gah! Im 32 weeks and having a baby girl!! :) i cant wait to.meet her. Time needs to fly by really fast so i can hold my baby girl lol.

question: I'm 32+3 and I'm so ready for these last couple of weeks to be over I'm anxious, excited, nervous, but overall full of joy I have all my son's things set up just waiting on him now! What about you ladies?
title: How far along is everyone?
